name: Opsera Agentic DevOps
description: AI-powered DevOps platform with CI/CD and AutoInfra capabilities. Features agents that learn from every deployment and incident to optimize delivery pipelines.
community_quotes: Agents learn from every deployment and incident
AI-powered delivery with CI/CD and AutoInfra
Address AI-assisted coding issues in DevOps workflows

name: JDoodle.ai 2.0
description: AI-powered website builder that allows cloning websites from URLs or converting Figma designs and images into editable starting points. Includes built-in database, automatic free bug fixes, and pay-as-you-go pricing.
community_quotes: Clone websites and Figma designs into editable sites
See a website you like? Start from it
A faster, simpler way to launch without starting from scratch

name: Doctective
description: Automated documentation tool that auto-updates all documentation from code, ensuring docs never go stale. Install once and have documentation that stays accurate as code changes.
community_quotes: Stop Updating Documentation. We Do It Accurately For You
Install once, document forever
Auto-updates all your documentation from your code

name: Verdent
description: An AI coding assistant built for deep focus with a clean, chat-first experience and no distractions. It asks clarifying questions early, helps developers handle multiple tasks at once, and clearly shows what changed in code.
community_quotes: Your AI-native partner for the new way to build software
Bring the joy back to coding with deep focus
Shows what changed in your code so you can spend more time creating

name: Zenflow by Zencoder
description: A specification-driven AI orchestration platform that brings engineering discipline to AI coding with multi-agent verification and structured workflows to end 'vibe coding'. Coordinates multiple AI agents to produce verified, production-grade results.
community_quotes: Zencoder drops Zenflow, a free AI orchestration tool that pits Claude against other models
Brings engineering discipline to AI coding by ending the era of vibe coding
Multi-agent verification compounds quality instead of degrading it

name: Demonstrate by Notte
description: Browser workflow automation platform that converts manual browser actions into reliable cloud automation through a 'teach by demonstration' approach. Features an open-source framework for building and deploying web-based AI agents at scale.
community_quotes: Build Web Automations via Demonstration - captures every browser interaction
Converts browser clicks into reliable cloud automation instantly
Full-stack framework combining AI for building and deploying AI agents

name: InsForge
description: AI-native backend platform specifically designed for AI coding agents, providing databases, authentication, storage, serverless functions, and AI capabilities through MCP (Model Context Protocol) server integration.
community_quotes: Backend primitives built for AI agents, not humans
Exposes backend through MCP server for structured access
Transforms coding agents into full-stack builders that can ship real apps in seconds

name: Harness Incident Response AI Agent
description: AI agent specifically trained to help DevOps teams investigate incidents. Automates incident response and provides intelligent analysis.
community_quotes: AI agent trained to investigate incidents
Helps DevOps teams respond faster
Automated incident investigation and analysis
